episode_event_passionate_spirit/4001_110:
One day, Dana elegantly accepted challenge after
challenge from several sync pairs.
episode_event_passionate_spirit/4001_100:
My, my, my... What a pity. Is that the end of
things for you?
Nggh... This is so frustrating!

Heh heh! If it’s difficult for you to accept, come
back and dare to challenge me again.
Yeah! I’ll be back!

This Battle Chatelaine really lives up to her
reputation!
Yeah. That doesn’t look easy.
My dad’s up next!
Ugh... You’re not bad, that’s for certain...

Hahaha! As the Tower Tycoon, I can’t go down so
easily!
Yes, well... My real stage is the Triple Battle!

If we were using the battle format I specialize in,
I’d never lose to someone like you!
Oho!

In that case, why don’t we battle in your preferred
format the next time we meet?

(She’s holding back... No, wait... Is she putting on
an act?)
(Just like Champion Nemona did...but why?)

(She has such talent. It would be a shame to let
her waste it like this...)
Now then! Who shall be my next challenger?!
I am Geeta, Top Champion of the Paldea region.
But before we battle, I must apologize in advance.

You see, I am completely incapable of holding
back in a Pokémon battle.

Therefore...it may be difficult for you to win,
unless you show your true self.
My, my, my... How kind of you to warn me!

However, there is no need for such thoughtful
gestures!
I see. Well, then...
I want to see the true measure of your talent!
episode_event_passionate_spirit/4002_100: You are putting on an act.

I felt it during our battle just now, which confirmed
my suspicions.

You have amazing skill, and more importantly, you
hide within you a fighting spirit and passion for
Pokémon battles...
Please tell me—

Why are you pretending to be someone
you’re not?
... Hee hee!
Hee hee...hee hee hee...hee hee!
Cheeky l’il... Now ye’ve gone ’n’ done it...
Hm?

That battle just now! You’ve lit a fire in me heart,
you have...
Now, why put on a show, ye ask?

Well, I’m ACTIN’ the Battle Chatelaine fer our
guests, o’ course!

Strength alone won’t draw guests to the Battle
Maison, now, will it? We need beauty and
elegance and the like!
Umm... Excuse me?

Ye think I don’t long to go all out in battle meself?
Sure, I’m always rarin’ to!

But I shut all that away fer the good o’ the
Maison!

Then you come along, and ye go an’—!
Ye go an’—!
Hee hee...hee hee hee!

That big sister o’ mine’ll hear ’bout this soon
enough anyway…

Now that we’ve come this far, there’s nothin’ fer it
but to have us some great fun!
Just like ye wanted!
I’ll show ye what I’m really capable of!

Ohh! Are we going to see one of those Triple
Battles we’ve heard so much about?
This oughta be good, right, Barry?

...I’m sorry. It seems I’ve said more than I
should have.

You appear to be under some stress, but if it’s for
your job, I suppose you don’t have a choice.
In any case, allow me to make amends...

I will show you what it means to face the Top
Champion! Let’s see if you can make it past me!
